name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, and **Fastify**, with hands-on expertise in **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Docker**. Demonstrated experience in designing and implementing **CI/CD** pipelines and infrastructure as code using **Terraform**.
Skilled in integrating ML models into applications, facilitating automated decision-making and real-time analytics. Seasoned in A/B testing frameworks, with strong analytical skills leveraging tools like **Polars** and **Pandas** to drive data-driven insights. Experienced in modern frontend frameworks such as **React** and **Next.js**, enhancing user interaction and interface performance. Committed to compliance-driven development and aligning solutions with industry standards for security and quality.
